channel.title: The Joes’ Rants
channel.description:
Powered by PodStrike! (www.podstrike.com). Welcome to The Joes’ Rants where we can talk about whatever the F*#k we want because this is Amuhrica!
This is a podcast where two Joe’s who have known each other way too long take important issues...and shit on them for your enjoyment.
While inebriated of course. *Clinky* to all our listeners, We salute you!

item.title: Episode01 - When The World Stopped Spinning
